thread.title: Amped Wireless Updates Your Old Wi-Fi with 12,000 sq ft of Blazing-Fast Wi-Fi
thread.title_full: Amped Wireless Updates Your Old Wi-Fi Network with 12,000 sq ft of Blazing-Fast Wi-Fi

author: Laura Baumgartner
title: Amped Wireless Updates Your Old Wi-Fi with 12,000 sq ft of Blazing-Fast Wi-Fi
text:
Amped Wireless, the leading manufacturer of high power, long-range wireless solutions for the home and office, today announced that its TITAN-AP High Power AC1900 WI-FI® Access Point is now available. The TITAN-AP instantly adds ultra-fast AC1900 Wi-Fi with ultimate coverage for any existing network in a home or office. It features true plug-and-play installation and upgrades Wi-Fi performance with extreme range and speed for all devices. Designed to add long range, superior Wi-Fi to demanding, multiple device households and businesses with existing routers, the TITAN-AP provides enough horsepower to easily manage music downloads, video chats, 4K content streaming and gaming all at the same time. The TITAN-AP can also be used to add Wi-Fi capabilities to networks that previously allowed only wired Internet connections.
Built with a 1GHz Dual-Core Processor, 14 high power amplifiers, and 4 high gain antennas, the TITAN-AP delivers superior Wi-Fi performance with ultimate coverage. The blazing fast AC1900 Wi-Fi technology provides speeds that reach up to an impressive 1900Mbps, making slow downloads and video buffering a thing of the past. With advanced 4 Antenna-Rx Technology the TITAN-AP provides stable and strong connections for all of your network devices at once by using a four antenna design to add an additional receiving radio stream for increased Wi-Fi reception capabilities.
The TITAN-AP instantly adds ultimate Wi-Fi performance and coverage to any existing network by attaching to a router or network switch and blanketing a home or office with untouchable connection speeds. In addition to improved performance, users can create up to 8 networks for guests and restrict access to specific users for enhanced security. The TITAN-AP is built with a 4-port Gigabit switch for connecting additional wired devices to the high power network. This includes devices like printers, smart TVs, gaming consoles and more. And, users can attach a USB drive to either of the two USB ports for instant and fast file sharing throughout the entire network.
“The demands for more Wi-Fi coverage and fast Internet speeds are always increasing. Add to that the rapidly growing number of Wi-Fi devices in a home or office connecting to the network and soon, your router that is just a few years old can no longer handle the load,” said Lacey Limbrick, Brand/Marketing Manager at Amped Wireless. “With its advanced design and engineering, the TITAN-AP can be added to your dated network to deliver a new Wi-Fi experience with ultimate performance, reliability and coverage. It can quickly update a router and improve Wi-Fi connectivity and coverage for even the most demanding users.”
The TITAN-AP Access Point is available for order today. Orders yours at http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/apa1900.html , or from major brick and mortar and online resellers in the weeks to come.
About Amped Wireless
Amped Wireless is an award-winning provider of long-range, wireless consumer and business communication products for the home and office. Ranked 16th in the 2013 Inc. 500 and 1st in the Computer Hardware Industry, Amped Wireless’ mission is to develop the highest quality, long range wireless products through experience, passion, innovation and advanced technology that exceed customers’ needs and expectations. For more information on Amped Wireless, The Leader in High Power Wireless Solutions™, please visit the Amped Wireless website at http://www.ampedwireless.com .
